glsa.title: XChat 2.0.x SOCKS5 Vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: XChat is vulnerable to a stack overflow that may allow a remote attacker to run arbitrary code.

background.p: XChat is a multiplatform IRC client.

description.p: The SOCKS 5 proxy code in XChat is vulnerable to a remote exploit. Users would have to be using XChat through a SOCKS 5 server, enable SOCKS 5 traversal which is disabled by default and also connect to an attacker's custom proxy server.

impact.p: This vulnerability may allow an attacker to run arbitrary code within the context of the user ID of the XChat client.

workaround.p: A workaround is not currently known for this issue. All users are advised to upgrade to the latest version of the affected package.
